label: Project Kickoff Meeting – Action Items
content:
- Alice to draft project charter by July 25.
- Bob to set up Git repository and CI/CD pipeline by July 22.
- Carol to prepare initial UI mockups by July 27.

label: Market Research Findings – Key Metrics
content:
- Monthly active users: 1.2M (+10% QoQ)
- Average session duration: 5m 30s
- Top 3 markets: US, EU, APAC
- Churn rate: 3.5%

4. Write unit/integration tests (Aug 12)
